thread.title: BRIEF-Kbr Steps Up Expansion Into High End Government Services With Acquisition Of Sgt

title: BRIEF-Kbr Steps Up Expansion Into High End Government Services With Acquisition Of Sgt

organizations.name: cquisition of sgt reuters staff kbr inc

text: 39 AM / Updated 3 minutes ago BRIEF-Kbr Steps Up Expansion Into High End Government Services With Acquisition Of Sgt Reuters Staff Kbr Inc: * KBR STEPS UP EXPANSION INTO HIGH END GOVERNMENT SERVICES WITH ACQUISITION OF SGT * KBR INC - TRANSACTION IS EXPECTED TO BE ACCRETIVE TO ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE IN FIRST FULL YEAR AFTER CLOSING * KBR INC - ‍TRANSACTION HAS BEEN UNANIMOUSLY APPROVED BY KBR BOARD OF DIRECTORS​ * KBR INC - ‍EXPECTS SGT TO BECOME A BUSINESS UNIT WITHIN KBRWYLE AND WILL MAINTAIN SGT‘S CURRENT MANAGEMENT STRUCTURE​ Source text for Eikon:
